questions.question: You are fine-tuning a pre-trained GPT model for a customer service chatbot. Which training technique is most appropriate if you want to adapt the model with minimal training data?
options: Freezing the initial layers and training the last few layers
Training the entire model with new data
Changing the tokenizer and training the whole model
correct_answers: Freezing the initial layers and training the last few layers
